mapper.sql: phrOrder.id as id , phrOrder.order_id as orderId , phrOrder.mobile as mobile , phrOrder.amt as amt , phrOrder.create_time as createTime , phrOrder.update_time as updateTime
mapper.insert:
insert into t_phr_order
id,
order_id,
mobile,
amt,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id},
#{orderId},
#{mobile},
#{amt},

mapper.update:
update t_phr_order
order_id = #{orderId},
mobile = #{mobile},
amt = #{amt},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
